articles.author: Lisa Rough
articles.text:
Some people take astrology more seriously than others, but regardless of your level of obsession with all things zodiac, you at least know your star sign. That said, have you ever wondered which cannabis strain best reflects your astrological sign? We were curious so we took it upon ourselves to pair up the best strains that complement each personality type based on their horoscope sign.
Whether you’re as stubborn as a ram, as dramatic as a lion, or as balanced as a scale, we’ve got a strain for you! So sit back, relax, and watch your stars and strains align.
Aries

Dates: 
March 21 – April 19
Characteristics: 
Enthusiastic, Energetic, Independent
Cannabis Strain: 

This sativa-dominant strain will quell any unpleasant feelings with a soothing euphoric boost. Double Dream also offers relaxation with a creative focus and uplifting haziness to let you concentrate on the task at hand, awash in a warm wave of euphoria.
Taurus

Dates: 
April 20 – May 20
Characteristics: 
Practical, Loyal, Dependable
Strain:

This sativa-dominant hybrid will uplift your spirit and instill a magical sense of euphoria. Your body will be buzzing and you’ll be tickled Orange Haze with laughter. Resistance is futile, Taurus, so don’t resist the joy and energy of this sweet citrus strain.
Gemini

Dates: 
May 21 – June 20
Characteristics: 
Energetic, Imaginative, Witty
Strain:

One of the great and illustrious beginnings for cannabis comes in the form of Haze, a California sativa that will lift you up with focus and creativity, but will also soothe any restlessness with a happy, imaginative buzz that will leave you spinning webs of inspiration.
Cancer

Dates: 
June 21 – July 22
Characteristics:
Tenacious, Adaptable, Loyal
Strain:

This strain favorite will be your new best friend. A hybrid blend, GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) (and its many descendants) are sure to put a smile on your face and bring you peace and relaxation. This is the strain you’ll want for when you’re looking to laugh until you giggle-snort (and then laugh some more).
Leo

Dates: 
July 23 – August 22
Characteristics: 
Confident, Dramatic, Enthusiastic
Strain:

Admittedly, you’re a drama queen, but this strain is guaranteed to lessen the drama and up the ante with joy. Your verbal skills fall dormant and allow someone else to take the spotlight for a change, while you will find yourself quietly in awe at the beauty of the world. Pineapple Express is a freight train that runs on euphoria – all aboard!
Virgo

Dates: 
August 23 – September 22
Characteristics: 
Analytical, Observant, Loyal
Strain:

For the quietly observant Virgo, Space Queen is a hybrid that will help you out of your shell and make you feel relaxed and comfortable. This is a particularly good choice for those with social anxiety, as it’s a highly fun, sociable strain that elicits easy conversation.
Libra

Dates: 
September 23 – October 22
Characteristics: 
Peaceful, Kind, Idealistic
Strain:

For the peaceful Libra, nothing suits you better than a high-CBD strain. This sativa-dominant option offers a clear-headed focus that will allow you to get your tasks done with a warm smile on your face. Harlequin is also a wonderful meditation aid, offering relaxation without sedation. Namaste!
Scorpio

Dates: 
October 23 – November 21
Characteristics: 
Passionate, Intense, Observant
Strain:

This hybrid is chock full of euphoric happiness. Lemon Skunk also tends to dissipate stress and allow your mind to wander freely through a mellow field of lemony goodness. This strain works whether you’re feeling sociable or flying solo, and you may find yourself feeling some verbose inspiration.
Sagittarius

Dates: 
November 22 – December 21
Characteristics: 
Adventurous, Independent, Conversational
Strain:

Alien Asshat is as fantastic and ridiculous as it sounds. A perfect match for your adventurous soul, this strain rocks a super high THC content that will blow you out of this world and gear you up for a cosmic journey through space and time (or maybe just an epic hike).
Capricorn

Dates: 
December 22 – January 19
Characteristics: 
Resourceful, Organized, Disciplined
Strain:

Mother’s Helper is perfect for your inner coordinator as it swirls creativity through your mind. Your organizational urges will be appeased with a supremely satisfying sativa burst of energy, followed by a happy mellow cool-down as you survey your accomplishments with pride.
Aquarius

Dates:
January 20 – February 18
Characteristics: 
Witty, Clever, Inventive
Strain: 

Blue Diamond will help you exercise your funny bone, with happy giggles and witty repartee galore. You’ll be the life of the party, albeit from the luxurious comfort of a reclined position on a comfy couch. You get the best of both worlds with a soothing dose of pain relief to boot.
Pisces

Dates:
February 9 – March 20
Characteristics: 
Compassionate, Imaginative, Escapist
Strain:

This strain is one of the best for bonding with friends. Pure Power Plant offers a warm, clear-headed euphoria that’s both uplifting and relaxing. Any leftover stress from your day will dissolve into psychedelic giggles and get you grooving to the music. Keep your eye drops handy, though – red eyes abound!
articles.title: Which Cannabis Strain Pairs Best With Your Zodiac Sign?

articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
They make us smile, they make us laugh, they make us stop mid-sentence and say, "Wait. What?" The Leafly Strain Review Hall of Fame has made its glorious comeback to celebrate the very best of your cannabis-fueled quirkiness. Yes, we take elevating the cannabis conversation seriously and we want to show the world that the cannabis community is comprised of mature, responsible individuals…but we can all share a harmless chuckle every once in a while, too.
So sit back, grab your favorite strain, and marvel at the amazing(ly hilarious) places our minds can sometimes go with a little help from our green friend. 
   Purple Haze
From the producers that brought you Hermit Crab Hotbox comes the true story of a lost adventurer and his unlikely crawdad friend. A compelling tale of love and loss.

Took me from down in the dumps to having a cool time. Went on an adventure and found a crawdad. I subsequently made friends with said crawdad and hung out with him. Man I miss Craymond.

   XJ-13
Because butts are funny.

At one point i had tingling feelings in my butt. Great for hanging out.

   Pure Power Plant
Yikes. At least Pure Power Plant was nice. (Also, we hope the scorpion made bail.)

Usually when I get stung by a scorpion, I capture them and make them kill themselves by circling them with lighter fluid and then lighting it so they sting themselves in the back. Smoking pure power plant helped me to understand that scorpions aren't inherently aggressive creatures, they're just defending themselves according to their genetic patterns. I took him out to a field behind my house and was going to let him go but a cop stopped me and arrested me due to a warrant and now he's sitting in a small jar with my other personal belongings at the county jail pending my trial date next month :/ Pure power plant was nice.

   Juicy Fruit
Three profound questions that we may never have the answers to. May Juicy Fruit one day help us unlock these mysteries.

Jesus…is he real…will we ever be able to see…how the kids see the taste of cinnamon toast crunch…or are frosted flakes better

   Master Jedi
Friends are there to love and support you, to pick you up off the ground when the going gets rough. And to point out when you're unable to accurately interpret reality.

This got me so high that I was convinced that the street light outside my house was the moon. Luckily my friend pointed out that "that's no moon."

   Afghan Kush
I would judge, except I think we've all been that guy with a dog bed hat at some point in our lives.

Smoked this shit and I was walking in tunnels made of rainbows and then proceeded to have a chocolate bar fight while wearing dog beds as hats in a London [drugstore]

   Purple Trainwreck
"The greatest pillow fort in all the land."

I learned how to make the greatest pillow fort in all the land. No girls allowed, just me and my dog Jack (to be fair he came up with the password so I had to let him in).

   Green Crack
Because no one has ever described the munchies better than this wordsmith.

I get really hungry every time I smoke this. Like really hungry. Like whole left side of the taco bell menu hungry.

   Maui Waui
Some feats just deserve an entire chicken's worth of credit.

Smoked a bowl of this and got inspired enough to clean my entire house. I felt incredibly accomplished and rewarded myself by eating a whole chicken.

   Platinum Bubba Kush
Today's lesson in sharing is brought to you by Platinum Bubba and the color purple.

Great floral taste and some of the strongest munchies ever. While we were on this strain, my friend asked if he could have some of the pizza I was making and I said no. I realized later that my munchies were so strong that I was not thinking rationally and of course split the pizza with him…and another. Make sure you have some Red Baron pizzas standing by in the freezer.

Photo credit: Kevin O'Mara via Flickr CC
articles.title: The Leafly Strain Reviews Hall of Fame: We Miss Craymond, Too

description: If you’re searching for a potent sativa, Pure Power Plant may be the strain for you. Featuring a musky, citrus smell, this strain is fairly pungent and skunk-like. Great for daytime, Pure Power Plant produces a clear-headed sensation while causing a pleasant, gentle pressure in the face and head. As this strain is not a pure sativa, however, some indica effects shine through, especially after heavy use. Too much Pure Power Plant may put you to sleep or leave you stuck on the couch. This strain is easy to grow both indoors and outdoors. Known for its high yields, PPP typically flowers in 8-10 weeks.
descriptionPlain: If you’re searching for a potent sativa, Pure Power Plant may be the strain for you. Featuring a musky, citrus smell, this strain is fairly pungent and skunk-like. Great for daytime, Pure Power Plant produces a clear-headed sensation while causing a pleasant, gentle pressure in the face and head. As this strain is not a pure sativa, however, some indica effects shine through, especially after heavy use. Too much Pure Power Plant may put you to sleep or leave you stuck on the couch. This strain is easy to grow both indoors and outdoors. Known for its high yields, PPP typically flowers in 8-10 weeks.
name: Pure Power Plant
